articles.author: Veronika Melkozerova
articles.title: Drones attack Moscow city center; Kremlin blames Ukraine - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The assault happened the night after Kyiv bombed a key bridge in a Russian-occupied area of Ukraine and two days after a missile damaged the Russian city of Taganrog.
articles.content:
Several drones attacked the center of Moscow in the early hours of Sunday morning, in the latest assault on Russian territory that the city’s mayor blamed on Kyiv. 
The drones hit two high-rise buil… [+2745 chars]
